issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: Some of the tests are not deterministic

comments.body:
Integrated in Hive-trunk-h0.21 #1698 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Hive-trunk-h0.21/1698/])
    HIVE-3507 Some of the tests are not deterministic
(Namit Jain via Carl Steinbach)

Summary: HIVE-3507 Some of the tests are not deterministic

Test Plan: reran the changed tests

Differential Revision: https://reviews.facebook.net/D5655 (Revision 1390277)

     Result = FAILURE

Test Plan: reran the changed tests
